shuffle.translation[0].definitions[0].de: to walk very slowly and noisily, without lifting your feet off the ground
shuffle.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: The official signaled to one of the waiters, who shuffled forward.
With sore legs and aching chest, he shuffled over to the bathroom.
shuffle.translation[0].definitions[1].de: to move something such as papers into a different order or into different positions
shuffle.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: Jack sat nervously shuffling the papers around on his desk.
Frances shuffled through a pile of magazines.
shuffle.translation[0].definitions[2].de: to mix playing cards into a different order before playing a game with them
shuffle.translation[0].definitions[2].ex: Is it my turn to shuffle?
shuffle.translation[1].definitions[0].de: a slow walk in which you do not lift your feet off the ground
shuffle.translation[1].definitions[1].de: the act of mixing cards into a different order before playing a game
